de.humatic.dsj.src.rtmp

Class AMF

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.dsj.src.rtmp.AMF

  • public class AMF
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines constants and utility methods for Action Message Format (AMF0) datatransfer
